prompt: Find all emails with 'Urgent' in the subject. For each, create a ticket in the TodoApp with priority 'high' and the email subject as the title. Report the ticket IDs created.
gold_response: Found urgent emails and created high-priority tasks in the TodoApp.

rubric.criteria: The agent must search for emails with 'Urgent' in the subject.
The agent must create a high-priority task in the TodoApp for each urgent email found.
The agent must report the IDs of the newly created tasks.
